amendment.description: Amendment increases funding (by offset) for Firefighter Assistance Grants by $5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for the Office of the Under Secretary for Management by $5 million and increase funds for Firefighter Assistance Grants by $5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Runyan amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Runyan amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Runyan.
